base_description: Rectangular, white shelf unit with modern design.
part_description: Contains three upper compartments and one large lower panel. The compartments are evenly spaced, rectangular, and positioned at the top. The lower panel covers the bottom section entirely.
internal_interaction_description: The three upper compartments provide separate storage spaces, likely for organizing items. The large lower panel may function as a door or cover, potentially concealing additional storage space or compartments behind it.
external_interaction_description: The shelf unit can be placed against a wall, used to store books, decor, or other items. It interacts with users by providing accessible storage and display options, and its modern design complements contemporary interiors.
